Package com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.commands

Interface IScript

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommand
    public interface IScript
extends ICommand
    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void execute()
      Unconditionally executes this script.
      java.lang.String getCall()
      Returns the entry point in code or null if there is not one.
      java.lang.String[] getFrom()
      Returns the FROM clause contents.
      java.lang.String getLanguage()
      Returns the programming language used by this SCRIPT.
      boolean isInline()
      Returns true if the source code is declared in the FROM clause command.
      boolean isOnStart()
      Returns true if this script will be automatically (not triggered by a rule) when ExEn starts.
      boolean isOnStop()
      Returns true if this script will be automatically (not triggered by a rule) before ExEn stops.
      IController newController()
      Creates an instance of IController: it is used by Drivers to communicate with the real world.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.commands.ICommand

        name, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • isOnStart

        boolean isOnStart()
        Returns true if this script will be automatically (not triggered by a rule) when ExEn starts.
        Returns:
        true if this script will be automatically (not triggered by a rule) when ExEn starts.

      • isOnStop

        boolean isOnStop()
        Returns true if this script will be automatically (not triggered by a rule) before ExEn stops.
        Returns:
        true if this script will be automatically (not triggered by a rule) before ExEn stops.

      • getLanguage

        java.lang.String getLanguage()
        Returns the programming language used by this SCRIPT.
        Returns:
        The programming language used.

      • isInline

        boolean isInline()
        Returns true if the source code is declared in the FROM clause command.
        Returns:
        true if the source code is declared in the FROM clause command.

      • getFrom

        java.lang.String[] getFrom()
        Returns the FROM clause contents. Either:
        • An array of length of N where each item is a file containing the needed code.
        • An array of length of 1 containing the source code.
        • Null if the source code was compiled and therefore not available.
        Returns:
        The FROM clause contents.

      • getCall

        java.lang.String getCall()
        Returns the entry point in code or null if there is not one.
        Returns:
        The entry point in code or null if there is not one.

      • execute

        void execute()
        Unconditionally executes this script.

      • newController

        IController newController()
        Creates an instance of IController: it is used by Drivers to communicate with the real world.
        Returns:
        An instance of IController or null if an error occurred.
